name: Koala Rider
text:
3 "Koala" monsters with different names
If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can banish 2 "Koala" monsters in your GY, except the ones used as Fusion Material for this card's Summon; draw 2 cards. If this card is destroyed by a card effect: Target 2 banished "Koala" cards; return them to the GY. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, you can activate one of these effects:
- This card gains 500 ATK
-This card's level increases by 1 and can attack again./nYou can only used each effect of "Koala Rider" once per turn.
